definition.name: Avatar
definition.purpose: Display a user's avatar image or fallback in a circular frame
definition.description: A reusable avatar component that displays a user's profile image in a circular frame. If the image is not available, a fallback is shown. Built on top of Radix UI's Avatar primitives.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the avatar root element

initial.data: Avatar with no image or fallback content

when.description: An image source is provided and loads successfully

visible: Circular avatar frame with user image

effects: User's profile image is displayed in the avatar frame

when.description: No image source is provided or image fails to load
when.event: Avatar image fails to load or is missing

visible: Circular avatar frame with fallback content

effects: Fallback content is displayed in the avatar frame

definition.visualLayout: A circular frame with either an image or fallback content centered inside
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix UI Avatar primitives for accessibility and composability. Accepts all props supported by Radix Avatar Root.

definition.name: AvatarImage
definition.purpose: Display the image inside the avatar frame
definition.description: A subcomponent for rendering the user's image within the avatar. Should be used as a child of the Avatar component. Built on top of Radix UI's Avatar.Image.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the image element

when.description: Image source is provided and loads successfully

effects: The user's image is shown in the avatar
Fallback content is displayed instead of the image

definition.visualLayout: Fills the avatar frame with the user's image, maintaining aspect ratio
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix UI Avatar.Image. Accepts all props supported by Radix Avatar Image.

definition.name: AvatarFallback
definition.purpose: Display fallback content when the avatar image is unavailable
definition.description: A subcomponent for rendering fallback content (such as initials or an icon) inside the avatar frame when the image is not available. Should be used as a child of the Avatar component. Built on top of Radix UI's Avatar.Fallback.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the fallback element

when.description: Image fails to load or is not provided

visible: Fallback content is shown in the avatar frame

effects: Fallback content (e.g., initials or icon) is displayed

definition.visualLayout: Fills the avatar frame with centered fallback content and muted background
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix UI Avatar.Fallback. Accepts all props supported by Radix Avatar Fallback.
